name: Google Places (New)
description: Search for places, get place details, and resolve locations using Google Places API
author: OneClaw Team

credentials.label: API Key
credentials.description: Google Maps API key with Places API enabled. Get one at console.cloud.google.com.

tools.name: places_search
tools.description: Search for places (restaurants, cafes, shops, etc.) using Google Places API. Supports location biasing, filtering by type, open status, rating, and price level. Returns place IDs that can be used with places_details for more info.

latitude.description: Center latitude for location bias (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Center longitude for location bias (-180 to 180)

type.description: Place type filter (e.g. "restaurant", "cafe", "gas_station", "pharmacy"). Only one type allowed.

open_now.description: Only return places that are currently open

price_levels.description: Price level filter. Array of integers 0-4 (0=free, 1=inexpensive, 2=moderate, 3=expensive, 4=very expensive)

keyword.description: Additional keyword to append to the search query for finer filtering

page_token.description: Token from a previous search response to get the next page of results

tools.name: places_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific place by its place ID. Returns name, address, coordinates, rating, price level, phone number, website, and opening hours.

place_id.description: The Google Place ID (obtained from places_search or places_resolve)

tools.name: places_resolve
tools.description: Resolve a location name or address to place IDs and coordinates. Useful for geocoding addresses or finding the place ID for a known location.

location_text.description: Location name or address to resolve (e.g. "Soho, London", "1600 Amphitheatre Parkway")
